abstract: Dollar Thrifty said it was willing to entertain a potential merger offer from the Avis Budget Group that could top an existing deal agreement with Hertz.
snippet: Dollar Thrifty said it was willing to entertain a potential merger offer from the Avis Budget Group that could top an existing deal agreement with Hertz.
lead_paragraph: 7:30 p.m. | Updated One day after the Avis Budget Group said it was prepared to offer a “substantially higher offer” for the Dollar Thrifty Automotive Group than the $1.2 billion proposal it had accepted from Hertz Global Holdings, Dollar Thrifty says it’s willing to listen.

headline.main: Dollar Thrifty Says It Will Consider an Avis Offer

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
